definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2

sentences.english: And it would be foolish to bet against the People's Bank.
sentences.chinese: 而和人民銀行作對就是犯傻。

sentences.english: The People's Bank made advances to commune-run factories.
sentences.chinese: 人民銀行貸款給社辦工廠。

sentences.english: As a result, the PBOChas de facto adopted a crawling-peg exchange-rate regime.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人民銀行實際上採取爬行釘住匯率制。

sentences.english: The People's Bank of China shall strengthen the supervision and administration of the business of commercial acceptance bills.
sentences.chinese: 人民銀行要加強對商業承兌匯票業務的監督管理。

sentences.english: The circulating fund of state-owned enterprises is regulated by the central bank.
sentences.chinese: 國營企業流動資金由人民銀行統一管理。

sentences.english: "Don't fight the People's Bank" says that's the right strategy now.
sentences.chinese: “別和人民銀行作對”按說是目前的良策。

sentences.english: Finance Minister Xie Xuren and the executive of the People's Bank of China will attend the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 財政部部長謝旭人和人民銀行負責人將出席會議。

definition: to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
China Banking Regulatory Commission (CBRC), abbr. for 中國銀行業監督管理委員會|中国银行业监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2 ye4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
abbr. for 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会, PRC National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC), formed in 2003
